table.name: vtiger_customerportal_tabs
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_customerportal_tabs` ( `tabid` int(19) NOT NULL, `visible` int(1) default '1', `sequence` int(1) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`tabid`) )

table.name: vtiger_customerportal_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_customerportal_fields` ( `tabid` int(19) NOT NULL, `fieldid` int(19) default NULL, `visible` int(1) default NULL )

table.name: vtiger_customerportal_prefs
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_customerportal_prefs` ( `tabid` int(11) NOT NULL, `prefkey` varchar(100) default NULL, `prefvalue` int(20) default NULL )
